name: Gardener the Ripper
description: The game is a gardener's life, his daily life is the killing of evil radishes that attack cabbage. Your job is to protect and grow cabbage.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel celeron Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel core DUO Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon R7 265 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space
